extension.summary: Set up multiple keyboards for local multiplayer gaming
Set up multiple keyboards for local multiplayer gaming
extension.description:
Uses XInput2 to create separate master devices for each player, enabling local multiplayer games with multiple keyboards and mice.
Perfect for couch gaming with multiple players, each using their own keyboard!
Features: - Detect keyboards by pressing ENTER - Optionally detect mice by clicking - Create separate X11 master devices per player - Reset to single player mode
Requirements: - Linux with X11 (not Wayland) - xinput command available - python-xlib library
